text:
🦠
Poem

#Chloroquine #Clorox & #Lysol
Treatment ideas from an assh*le

Trump’s no doctor
plays one on TV

Most corrupt president
 in history

Pushes fake cures
endangering lives

People need truth
he only tells lies

#TrumpPressConference #COVID19 #DrBirx #TrumpVirus #BLEACH https://t.co/Xtr7bdO6WM
